item.title: How to Perform RSA Encryption in Javascript (React.js) and Golang
item.author: bart@mikasoftware.com (Mika Software Corporation)
item.description: Do you want your React.js (web) frontend app talking to your Golang backend server? In this post, I’ll explain how I got cross-devices RSA encryption working in JavaScript and Golang.
